text:
Las Vegas Massacre: what we know so far
America woke up this morning to news of the deadliest mass shooting in US history. At least 59 are dead and more than 500 were injured during the massacre at a music festival in Las Vegas, Nevada. The shooter had no police record or violent past, according to officials. Ed Schultz has more.
‘We just gotta get guns out of people’s hands’ – Nevada state senator
Nevada state senator Tick Segerblom joins “News with Ed” to discuss possible motives behind Stephen Paddock’s actions for the Las Vegas Massacre Sunday night, how the city can better protect itself going forward and President Donald Trump’s reaction.
title: News With Ed -- October 2, 2017
